title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 774/98 of 8 April 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2342/92 on imports of pure-bred breeding animals of the bovine species from third countries and the granting of export refunds thereon and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 1544/79
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 774/98 of 8 April 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2342/92 on imports of pure-bred breeding animals of the bovine species from third countries and the granting of export refunds thereon and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 1544/79
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
